long_description: The course-thread Kinetic Traxle is a precision-machined replacement axle for mountain bikes that easily adapts a 12mm thru-axle system to firmly lock into the Kinetic bike trainer cone cups. Course thread pitch is compatible with GT (2014), Salsa (2014) bikes, and the Diamondback Mason and Mason FS series. Also compatible with Trek, Niner, Cantfield, Giant Reign X bikes. Please note that Santa Cruz bikes with a closed dropout on the drive side (2013/14) will not currently work with the Traxle.
short_description: The course-thread Kinetic Traxle is a precision-machined replacement axle for mountain bikes that easily adapts a 12mm thru-axle system to firmly lock into the Kinetic bike trainer cone cups.
